text: Ba le honohela. Empa ha ba otloa ke ts’abo, u tla ba bona ba talimile ka lona ka mahlo a ntseng a panya-panya sa motho ea makhatheng a lefu: Hang hoba letsoalo le khutse, ba u chesa ka maleme a nchocho tlas’a lipelo tse telele thepeng. Ba joalo ba hloka tumelo, Ka lebaka leo, Allah U etsa liketso tsa bona lefeela: Seo se bobebe ho Allah
